item.title: About
item.description:
About Us

GetLatestVersion.eu stems from GetLatestVersion.it, the successful Italian community specialised on DevOps, Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) and Software Development Life-Cycle (SDLC).

What we do

We publish posts and articles on DevOps, Agile, tools, design, implementation techniques. Our YouTube channel hosts useful video of different kind: short introductions to a topic or tool, longer presentation on experiences and conference sessions. In addition, we organise events in person and online on DevOps, Agile, ALM and SDLC topics.

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
List of Cookies used in this site

Google Analytics cookies: __utma, __utmb, __utmc, __utmv, __utmz, used to gather site statistic usage. You can read more info on Google Policies on: How Google uses data when you use our partners’ sites or apps and Safeguarding your Data.
